attributes.action: review the cost-effectiveness and environmental benefit of nationwide Tetra Pak recycling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tetra Pak is becoming ever more popular for many different products, yet only 7% of UK councils offer recycling facilities for it so the majority of waste ends up in landfill sites. 

We urge the Prime Minister to arrange a review of the economic and environmental impact of mandatory Tetra Pak recycling schemes in every local authority area in the UK.
